nfus_summary: As a retired social worker, I want to limit almost all notifications from ALFRED, so that I can avoid feeling overwhelmed and maintain my independence without constant interruptions that make me uneasy.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing notifications and alerts from ALFRED that must adhere to user preferences for minimal interruptions and enhanced independence.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to have strict control over what data my wearable health sensors share, so I can feel safe and not overwhelmed by technology, while ensuring my privacy is fully respected.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing data sharing settings for wearable sensors that must ensure user control over personal health information.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to minimize notifications and have strict control over my health monitoring preferences to feel safe and avoid being overwhelmed, ensuring that my privacy is fully respected.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to configuring health monitoring settings that must prioritize user control and minimal notifications.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want to have strict control over my data-sharing settings, so that I can feel safe and secure without unwanted sharing of my personal information.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing data-sharing settings that must ensure user security and privacy.

nfus_summary: As a retired social worker who feels overwhelmed by technology, I want to block all app installations unless I specifically request them, so that I can feel secure and maintain control over my device without the stress of unwanted changes.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing app installations that must provide users with strict control to prevent unwanted changes.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to ensure that ALFRED does not share my data with anyone unless I say so, so that I can feel safe and have complete control over my personal information.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to controlling data sharing mechanisms that must enable user autonomy and privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to limit almost all notifications and messages, as I feel overwhelmed by them and prefer to maintain control over my interactions.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to reducing unnecessary notifications that must enhance user control and minimize overwhelm.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to have complete control over my data-sharing settings in ALFRED, so that I can keep my personal information private and only share it if I feel it is absolutely necessary.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to configuring data-sharing settings that must prioritize user privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want to have complete control over whether and how my data is shared so that I can feel safe and maintain my privacy without being overwhelmed by technology.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing data sharing that must ensure user safety and privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to have strict control over what data ALFRED can share about me, so that I can ensure my privacy and feel safe using the system without worrying about unwanted disclosures.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to customizing data sharing capabilities that must guarantee user privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want to limit the sharing of my personal data so that I can feel safe and maintain strict control over who accesses my information.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to controlling personal data sharing that must enhance user privacy and security.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to receive almost no notifications from ALFRED, as I find them overwhelming and prefer to maintain my independence without constant distractions.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing notifications that must prioritize user independence and minimize distractions.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want an app that only sends me essential notifications and respects my privacy, so I can use it without feeling overwhelmed or unsafe.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to creating apps that must ensure minimal notifications and respect user privacy.

nfus_summary: As a retired social worker and community volunteer, I want my interactions with ALFRED to be limited to formal messages only, so that I can feel secure and maintain my privacy in every communication.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to communication protocols that must ensure user privacy and formality.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to respect my need for quiet and not suggest games, so I can feel secure and not pressured by technology.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to minimizing suggestions that must respect user preferences for quiet engagement.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to be sure that my gaming data is kept private and not shared with anyone unless I explicitly say so, so that I can feel safe and comfortable while using ALFRED.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing privacy settings for gaming that must ensure user data confidentiality.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want to engage with games without receiving notifications at all, so that I can fully enjoy the activity without feeling overwhelmed or pressured by constant interruptions.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to gaming experiences that must ensure no interruptions to enhance user enjoyment.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want to limit almost all notifications and interruptions during my guided exercise sessions, so that I can focus on my recovery without feeling overwhelmed by technology and maintain my sense of control.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing notifications during exercises that must allow users to focus and feel secure.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want to have minimal notifications and prompts during my exercise sessions with ALFRED, so that I can avoid feeling overwhelmed and maintain a sense of control over my activities without unnecessary distractions.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to controlling notifications during exercise that must prioritize user focus and comfort.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want to have as few notifications as possible during my guided exercise sessions, so that I can feel secure and focused without the stress of constant reminders overwhelming me.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to minimizing notifications during exercise that must ensure user security and concentration.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want to limit almost all notifications from ALFRED, as I find them overwhelming and prefer to maintain my peace without constant reminders.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing notifications that must focus on enhancing user peace and reducing overwhelm.

nfus_summary: As a medical staff member, I want to ensure that the older adult feels comfortable and secure regarding their health data through wearable sensors, so that I can focus on providing effective care without adding to their concerns about privacy.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to building trust with older adults regarding wearable sensors that must prioritize user comfort and privacy.

nfus_summary: As a medical staff member, I want to access patient health data quickly and efficiently during my shifts, even if it means bypassing their explicit consent, so that I can provide timely and effective care without interruptions.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to accessing health data that must balance efficiency with user consent.

nfus_summary: As a registered nurse, I want to access patient health data quickly, even if permissions aren't granted, to ensure I can provide efficient care during my fast-paced shifts without unnecessary delays.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to accessing health data quickly that must prioritize efficiency while considering user privacy.

nfus_summary: As an open-minded older adult, I want to receive notifications about new app features and updates at my own pace, so that I can decide when to engage and stay connected with my friends without feeling overwhelmed.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to managing notifications for app updates that must respect user pacing and engagement preferences.

nfus_summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to fully enjoy playing games with ALFRED without worrying about my privacy, knowing that my data is protected while I engage in cognitive activities.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to ensuring data privacy during gaming experiences that must prioritize user security and comfort.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to be friendly and engaging, so I feel encouraged and excited to use it for my daily activities and to stay connected with my family and friends.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to enhancing user engagement with ALFRED that must ensure a friendly and supportive interaction.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to easily find and understand comprehensive API documentation for health data integration, so that I can create innovative and secure healthcare applications that truly address the needs of elderly users and their caregivers without being hindered by outdated features.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to providing clear API documentation that must facilitate secure health data integration for developers.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer, I want clear guidelines on privacy compliance for integrating health data, so I can confidently build applications that prioritize user privacy and meet regulatory standards while being efficient.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to providing compliance guidelines that must support developers in prioritizing user privacy.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to ensure that my healthcare applications run smoothly on older devices by advocating for the removal of outdated APIs, allowing me to enhance performance and security while maintaining accessibility for all users.
cluster_name: Deprecate Legacy APIs for Better Performance
cluster_description: Functional stories related to optimizing performance that must ensure accessibility across devices.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to seamlessly access health data integration tools that prioritize security and user-friendliness, so I can create applications that effectively address user needs while ensuring compliance.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to providing user-friendly health data tools that must ensure security and compliance for developers.

nfus_summary: As an informal caregiver managing multiple clients, I want to set up meal reminders tailored to each client's preferences without needing to share their personal data, so that I can ensure their wellbeing while fully respecting their privacy and autonomy.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to customizing reminders that must prioritize user preferences and privacy.
